info.task: read checked menuitemcheckbox in a group in a submenu
info.title: Read checked menu item checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: focusonfirstlink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
testPageDocument.querySelector('a').focus();

user: Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow.
Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.)
Activate the screen reader reading cursor.
instructions.raw: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox and check it by pressing enter. (the menu will close.) | Re-open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Italic' menu item checkbox. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the 'Italic' menu item checkbox
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Font Style ' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Font Style' group are conveyed
